birth_place.zh-cn: 日占朝鲜平安南道平壤府古顺和面
birth_place.en: Koshunwa-men, Heian'nan-dō, Korea under Japanese rule

death_place.zh-cn: 朝鲜平安北道香山郡妙香山
death_place.en: Myohyang-san, Hyangsan County, North Pyongan Province, North Korea

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和第一位最高领导人。他长期担任朝鲜劳动党总书记和朝鲜国家主席，开创了主体思想，并在朝鲜建立了个人崇拜和家族世袭统治。他在苏联的支持下建立了朝鲜政权，并主导发动了朝鲜战争。在其执政期间，他通过一系列政治清洗巩固了个人权力。
description.en: The founder of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) and its first supreme leader. He served as the General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the President of the DPRK for a long period, created the Juche ideology, and established a personality cult and a family hereditary rule in North Korea. He established the North Korean regime with Soviet support and led the initiation of the Korean War. During his rule, he consolidated his personal power through a series of political purges.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛北部的社会主义国家，由金日成在苏联支持下建立。
description.en: A socialist state in the northern part of the Korean Peninsula in East Asia, established by Kim Il-sung with the support of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的执政党，由金日成创立并长期领导。
description.en: The ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, founded and led by Kim Il-sung for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量，由金日成创建。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, founded by Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪的社会主义联邦国家。在金日成建立政权和发动朝鲜战争的过程中提供了关键支持，但后期因与韩国建交而与朝鲜关系恶化。
description.en: A socialist federal state in the 20th century. It provided crucial support to Kim Il-sung in establishing his regime and launching the Korean War, but relations with North Korea deteriorated later due to its establishment of diplomatic ties with South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 一场始于朝鲜入侵韩国的战争，由金日成主导发动，最终在中国和苏联的介入下，以签署停战协定告终，朝鲜半岛分裂格局固定化。
description.en: A war that began with North Korea's invasion of South Korea, initiated under the leadership of Kim Il-sung. With the intervention of China and the Soviet Union, it ended with the signing of an armistice agreement, solidifying the division of the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，他同意并支持了金日成发动朝鲜战争的计划。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union, who approved and supported Kim Il-sung's plan to start the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。他在斯大林的要求下同意了金日成的作战计划，并在朝鲜人民军溃败后派遣中国人民志愿军入朝参战。他与金日成的关系在中苏交恶后变得复杂。
description.en: The main founder of the People's Republic of China. At Stalin's request, he agreed to Kim Il-sung's plan of attack and sent the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to fight in Korea after the Korean People's Army was routed. His relationship with Kim Il-sung became complicated after the Sino-Soviet split.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的社会主义国家。在朝鲜战争中为朝鲜提供了决定性的军事援助。两国关系在1992年中韩建交后一度冷却。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia. It provided decisive military aid to North Korea during the Korean War. Relations between the two countries cooled for a time after China established diplomatic relations with South Korea in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争期间派遣的武装力量，对扭转战局起到了关键作用。
description.en: The armed forces dispatched by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War, which played a key role in turning the tide of the war.

description.zh-cn: 金日成的长子和继承人，朝鲜第二代最高领导人。
description.en: Kim Il-sung's eldest son and successor, the second supreme leader of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金日成的第二任妻子，金正日之母。
description.en: Kim Il-sung's second wife, mother of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金日成的第三任妻子。
description.en: Kim Il-sung's third wife.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的在中国东北地区的抗日武装力量，金日成曾是其成员并担任指挥官。
description.en: An anti-Japanese armed force led by the Chinese Communist Party in Northeast China. Kim Il-sung was a member and served as a commander.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。金日成于1931年至1945年间为其党员。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. Kim Il-sung was a member from 1931 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜共产主义运动家，南朝鲜劳动党领导人之一，后被金日成以“美国间谍”罪名处决。
description.en: A Korean communist activist and a leader of the Workers' Party of South Korea, later executed by Kim Il-sung on charges of being an 'American spy'.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜共产主义运动家，南朝鲜劳动党领导人，金日成的主要政治对手之一，后被以“美国间谍”罪名处决。
description.en: A Korean communist activist, leader of the Workers' Party of South Korea, and one of Kim Il-sung's main political rivals, later executed on charges of being an 'American spy'.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治家，延安派（亲华派）的代表人物，后被金日成清洗。
description.en: A North Korean politician and a representative of the Yan'an faction (pro-China), later purged by Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 由金日成创立的政治思想体系，是朝鲜的官方意识形态核心，强调政治上的自主、经济上的自足、国防上的自卫。
description.en: A political ideology system created by Kim Il-sung, which is the core of North Korea's official ideology, emphasizing political independence (Chaju), economic self-sufficiency (Charip), and self-reliance in defense (Chawi).

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜独立运动家，金日成之父。
description.en: A Korean independence activist and the father of Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜独立运动家，金日成之母。
description.en: A Korean independence activist and the mother of Kim Il-sung.

en: Normalization of China–South Korea relations in 1992

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与大韩民国建立外交关系，此事导致中朝关系一度恶化。
description.en: The establishment of diplomatic relations between the People's Republic of China and the Republic of Korea, which led to a temporary deterioration in Sino-North Korean relations.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军上将，自14岁起便追随金日成，是其患难与共的战友。
description.en: A general of the Korean People's Army who followed Kim Il-sung since the age of 14, being his comrade through thick and thin.

description.zh-cn: 金日成因突发心脏病逝世。据称，其病发与听闻战友赵明选上将病故后情绪激动有关。
description.en: Kim Il-sung passed away due to a sudden heart attack. His attack was reportedly triggered by emotional distress after hearing about the death of his comrade, General Cho Myong-son.

relationships.target: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 金日成在苏联的支持下建立了朝鲜民主主义人民共和国。
description.en: Kim Il-sung founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with the support of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 金日成是朝鲜劳动党的主要建立者之一，并长期担任其最高领导人。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was one of the main founders of the Workers' Party of Korea and served as its supreme leader for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 金日成是朝鲜人民军的主要建立者之一。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was one of the main founders of the Korean People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 金日成是政治思想体系“主体思想”的开创者。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was the creator of the political ideology system 'Juche Idea'.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战结束后，金日成获得苏联支持，在朝鲜半岛北部建立政权并成为最高领导人。
description.en: After World War II, Kim Il-sung gained the support of the Soviet Union to establish a regime in the northern Korean Peninsula and become its supreme leader.

description.zh-cn: 金日成主导发动了朝鲜战争，意图通过武力统一朝鲜半岛。
description.en: Kim Il-sung led the initiation of the Korean War with the intention of unifying the Korean Peninsula by force.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林同意了金日成以武力统一朝鲜半岛的计划，但要求必须获得毛泽东的同意。
description.en: Stalin agreed to Kim Il-sung's plan to reunify the Korean Peninsula by force, but required that he obtain Mao Zedong's consent.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东同意了金日成的战争计划，并在战局不利时派遣中国人民志愿军支援朝鲜。
description.en: Mao Zedong agreed to Kim Il-sung's war plan and sent the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to support North Korea when the war situation turned unfavorable.

description.zh-cn: 在中国同意出兵援朝后，中国人民志愿军入朝参战，与朝鲜人民军组成联军对抗联合国军。
description.en: After China agreed to send troops to aid North Korea, the Chinese People's Volunteer Army entered the war and formed a joint force with the Korean People's Army to fight against the UN forces.

description.zh-cn: 金日成以“美国间谍”的罪名处决了其竞争对手、南朝鲜劳动党领导人李承烨。
description.en: Kim Il-sung executed his rival, Ri Sung-yop, a leader of the Workers' Party of South Korea, on charges of being an 'American spy'.

description.zh-cn: 金日成以“美国间谍”的罪名处决了其主要竞争对手、南朝鲜劳动党领导人朴宪永。
description.en: Kim Il-sung executed his main rival, Pak Hon-yong, a leader of the Workers' Party of South Korea, on charges of being an 'American spy'.

description.zh-cn: 金日成清洗了以金斗奉为代表的亲华派（延安派）力量。
description.en: Kim Il-sung purged the pro-China (Yan'an) faction represented by Kim Tu-bong.

description.zh-cn: 金日成于1931年至1945年间为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was a member of the Chinese Communist Party from 1931 to 1945.

position.zh-cn: 师长、方面军指挥、支队长
position.en: Division Commander, Front Commander, Detachment Leader

description.zh-cn: 金日成在东北抗日联军中历任多个指挥职务，领导抗日游击战。
description.en: Kim Il-sung held several command positions in the Northeast Anti-Japanese United Army, leading anti-Japanese guerrilla warfare.

description.zh-cn: 金正日是金日成与金正淑的长子。
description.en: Kim Jong-il is the eldest son of Kim Il-sung and Kim Jong-suk.

description.zh-cn: 金正日是金日成与金正淑的长子。
description.en: Kim Jong-il is the eldest son of Kim Il-sung and Kim Jong-suk.

description.zh-cn: 金圣爱是金日成的第三任妻子。
description.en: Kim Song-ae was Kim Il-sung's third wife.

description.zh-cn: 金正淑是金日成的第二任妻子。
description.en: Kim Jong-suk was Kim Il-sung's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 金日成是金亨稷之子。
description.en: Kim Il-sung is the son of Kim Hyong-jik.

description.zh-cn: 金日成是康盘石之子。
description.en: Kim Il-sung is the son of Kang Pan-sok.

description.zh-cn: 中国决定与韩国建交，此事通报金日成后，导致中朝关系严重恶化，金日成对此反应冷淡。
description.en: China's decision to establish diplomatic relations with South Korea caused a severe deterioration in Sino-North Korean relations after Kim Il-sung was informed, to which he reacted coldly.

description.zh-cn: 赵明选上将自14岁起追随金日成，是其几十年的患难与共的战友，情同手足。
description.en: General Cho Myong-son followed Kim Il-sung since the age of 14 and was his comrade through decades of hardship, being as close as brothers.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在听闻其亲密战友赵明选的死讯后，情绪激动，引发心脏病急性发作，最终导致其在次日逝世。
description.en: After hearing the news of the death of his close comrade Cho Myong-son, Kim Il-sung became emotionally agitated, which triggered an acute heart attack, leading to his death the following day.
